ddf.catalog.history

Class Historian

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.history.Historian

  • public class Historian
extends Object
    Class utilizing StorageProvider and CatalogProvider to version Metacards and associated ContentItems.

                         throws IngestException,
                                StorageException
        Versions created Metacards and ContentItems.

        createStorageRequest - Versions this requests items
        Returns:

      • version

        public Optional<String> version(UpdateStorageRequest streamUpdateRequest,
                                UpdateStorageResponse updateStorageResponse,
                                HashMap<String,Path> tmpContentPaths)
                         throws IOException
        Versions updated Metacards and ContentItems.
        Parameters:
        streamUpdateRequest - Needed to pass MetacardVersion.SKIP_VERSIONING flag into downstream update
        updateStorageResponse - Versions this response's updated items
        tmpContentPaths - The temporary content paths needed to duplicate the ContentItems
        Returns:
        The transaction key for using with commit(String) and rollback(String)
        Throws:
        IOException

        deleteResponse - Versions this responses deleted metacards

      • commit

        public List<Exception> commit(String historianTransactionKey)
        Commits a set of staged operations.
        Parameters:
        historianTransactionKey - The key associated with a set of operations to commit
        Returns:
        A List of exceptions, if any, generated by the commit operations

      • rollback

        public void rollback(String historianTransactionKey)
        Removes a set of staged operations.

        Calling multiple times or on a non-existent key has no effect.
        Parameters:
        historianTransactionKey - The key associated with the set of operations to upstage.
